anya-e0105n2:2_1: Kasmā vedakālato paṭṭhāya yāvajjatanā sabbepi brāhmaṇā
anya-e0105n2:4_1: Padbhyāṁ gūdro ajāyatā’’ti iruveda, 10-maṇḍala, 90; tathā athava 6 veda 19, 6, 6.
anya-e0105n2:5_0: Imaṁ purisasuttaṁ nāma mantaṁ jānantīti saddahiyā.
anya-e0105n2:6_0: Ayaṁ panassā attho – ‘brāhmaṇo assa (brahmuno) mukhaṁ āsi. Bāhū rājañño kato,
anya-e0105n2:6_1: khattiyā assa bāhūti vuttaṁ hoti. Yo vesso, so assa ūrū. Suddo assa pādehi ajāyī’ti.
anya-e0105n2:7_0: Buddhaghoso pana ‘paṇḍitabrāhmaṇo’ti ñātopi taṁ gāthaṁ na aññāsi.
anya-e0105n2:7_1: Tathā hi tena bandhupādāpaccāti padassa atthavaṇṇanāyaṁ ‘tesaṁ kira ayaṁ laddhi – brāhmaṇā brahmuno mukhato nikkhantā, khattiyā urato, vessā nābhito, suddā jāṇuto, samaṇā piṭṭhipādato’ti dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.263; ma. ni. aṭṭha.
anya-e0105n2:8_0: Ayaṁ panettha anuvicāraṇā – yadi ca taṁkālikānampi brāhmaṇānaṁ laddhi tatheva bhaveyya yathā etissaṁ gāthāyaṁ vuttā,
anya-e0105n2:8_2: Evaṁ sati sā vicāraṇā yuttā bhaveyya.
anya-e0105n2:8_3: Etissaṁ pana gāthāyaṁ ‘‘brāhmaṇosya mukhamāsīdi’’ti paṭhamapādena ‘‘brāhmaṇā brahmuno mukhato jātā’’ti attho ujukato na labbhati.
anya-e0105n2:8_4: Buddhakāle pana brāhmaṇānaṁ laddhi ‘‘brāhmaṇā brahmuno mukhato jātā’’ti evameva ahosīti pākaṭoyevāyamattho.
anya-e0105n2:9_0: ‘‘Dissanti kho pana vāseṭṭha brāhmaṇānaṁ brāhmaṇiyo utuniyopi gabbhiniyopi vijāyamānāpi pāyamānāpi.
anya-e0105n2:9_1: Te ca brāhmaṇā 0 yonijāva samānā evamāhaṁsu – brāhmaṇova seṭṭho vaṇṇo, hīnā aññe vaṇṇā. Brāhmaṇova sukko vaṇṇo, kaṇhā aññe vaṇṇā. Brāhmaṇāva sujjhanti, no abrāhmaṇā.
anya-e0105n2:9_2: Brāhmaṇāva brahmuno puttā orasā mukhato jātā brahmajā brahmanimmitā brahmadāyādāti.
anya-e0105n2:9_3: Te brahmānañceva abbhācikkhanti, musā ca bhāsanti,
anya-e0105n2:10_0: Bhagavatā mahākāruṇikena vāseṭṭhabhāradvājānaṁ brāhmaṇamāṇavakānaṁ bhāsitaṁ, tehi ca taṁ abhinanditaṁ.
anya-e0105n2:10_1: Te pana dvepi māṇavakā jātivasena parisuddhabrāhmaṇā ceva honti tiṇṇampi vedānaṁ pāraguno ca.
anya-e0105n2:10_2: Tasmā ‘‘brāhmaṇā brahmuno mukhato nikkhantā’’ti vacanassa taṁkālikānaṁ brāhmaṇānaṁ laddhivasena vuttabhāvo pākaṭoyeva. Yathā cetaṁ, evaṁ ‘‘khattiyā urato, vessā nābhito, suddā jāṇuto,
anya-e0105n2:10_3: samaṇā piṭṭhipādato’’ti vacanampi ‘‘taṁkālikabrāhmaṇānaṁ laddhiññūhi porāṇaṭṭhakathācariyehi vutta’’nti saddahitvā ācariyabuddhaghosena taṁ sabbaṁ porāṇaṭṭhakathāto bhāsāparivattanamattena visesetvā pakāsitaṁ bhaveyya.
anya-e0105n2:10_4: Tasmā tāyapi vedagāthāya ācariyassa abrāhmaṇabhāvasādhanaṁ anupapannamevāti.
anya-e0105n2:11_0: (Kha) punapi tena ācariyabuddhaghosattherassa abrāhmaṇabhāvasādhanatthaṁ dutiyampi kāraṇaṁ evamāhaṭaṁ –
anya-e0105n2:12_0: ‘‘Brāhmaṇaganthesu gabbhaghātavācakaṁ bhrūnahāti padaṁ pāḷiyaṁ bhūnahu (bhūnahano) iti dissati.
anya-e0105n2:12_1: Māgaṇḍiyasutte bhariyāya methunasaṁvāsābhāvena uppajjanārahagabbhassa nāsakattaṁ sandhāya māgaṇḍiyo paribbājako bhagavantaṁ ‘bhūnahu (bhūnahano) samaṇo gotamo’ti ma. ni. 2.207 ādayo āha.
anya-e0105n2:12_2: Taṁ buddhaghoso na jānātīti pākaṭoyeva tadatthasaṁvaṇṇanāya.
anya-e0105n2:12_3: Tattha hi tena bhūnahunoti (bhūnahanassā) padaṁ ‘hatavaḍḍhino mariyādakārakassā’ti ma. ni. aṭṭha. 2.207 vaṇṇita’’nti.
anya-e0105n2:13_1: Na hi māgaṇḍiyena phoṭṭhabbārammaṇāparibhogamattameva sandhāya bhūnahubhāvo vutto,
anya-e0105n2:13_2: atha kho channampi lokāmisārammaṇānaṁ aparibhogaṁ sandhāya vutto. Tasmiñhi sutte –
anya-e0105n2:14_1: taṁ tathāgatassa dantaṁ guttaṁ rakkhitaṁ saṁvutaṁ,
anya-e0105n2:14_3: idaṁ nu te etaṁ māgaṇḍiya sandhāya bhāsitaṁ ‘bhūnahu samaṇo gotamo’ti.
anya-e0105n2:14_4: Etadeva kho pana me bho gotama sandhāya bhāsitaṁ ‘bhūnahu samaṇo gotamo’ti. Taṁ kissa hetu,
anya-e0105n2:14_5: evañhi no sutte ocaratīti…pe… mano kho māgaṇḍiya dhammārāmo dhammarato dhammasammudito,
anya-e0105n2:14_6: so tathāgatassa danto gutto rakkhito saṁvuto,
anya-e0105n2:14_8: idaṁ nu te etaṁ māgaṇḍiya sandhāya bhāsitaṁ ‘bhūnahu samaṇo gotamo’ti.
anya-e0105n2:14_9: Etadeva kho pana me bho gotama sandhāya bhāsitaṁ ‘bhūnahu samaṇo gotamo’ti. Taṁ kissa hetu,
anya-e0105n2:14_10: evañhi no sutte ocaratī’’ti ma. ni. 2.207 ādayo.
anya-e0105n2:15_0: Evaṁ bhagavato ca anuyogo māgaṇḍiyassa ca paṭiññā āgatā.
anya-e0105n2:16_0: Ettha hi methunappaṭisevanavasena phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaparibhogahetu eva gabbhapatiṭṭhānaṁ sambhavatīti tadaparibhogameva sandhāya ‘‘bhūnahū’’ti vattuṁ arahati,
anya-e0105n2:16_2: tatthāpi visesato dhammārammaṇassa suddhamanoviññāṇena paribhogahetu natthi kiñci gabbhapatiṭṭhānanti tesaṁ aparibhogaṁ sandhāya bhūnahūti vattuṁ na arahatiyeva,
anya-e0105n2:16_3: māgaṇḍiyena pana sabbānipi tāni sandhāya vuttabhāvo paṭiññāto,
anya-e0105n2:16_5: Tasmā kiñcāpi dāni brāhmaṇaganthesu bhūnahu- (bhrūnahā) saddo gabbhaghātanatthe dissati,
anya-e0105n2:16_6: māgaṇḍiyasutte paneso attho na yujjatīti ācariyena ‘‘hatavaḍḍhi mariyādakārako’’ti ayamevattho porāṇaṭṭhakathāya bhāsāparivattanavasena pakāsitoti veditabbo.
anya-e0105n2:17_2: 31) brāhmaṇānaṁ parihāsaṁ karonto ‘evaṁ iminā piṇḍapātapaṭisevanena purāṇañca jighacchāvedanaṁ paṭihaṅkhāmi,
anya-e0105n2:17_3: navañca vedanaṁ aparimitabhojanapaccayaṁ āharahatthaka alaṁsāṭaka tatravaṭṭaka kākamāsaka bhuttavamitakabrāhmaṇānaṁ aññataro viya na uppādessāmīti paṭisevatī’ti āha.
anya-e0105n2:17_4: Idaṁ pana ekassa bhinnabrāhmaṇaladdhikassāpi vacanaṁ siyāti tadeva daḷhakāraṇaṁ katvā na sakkā ‘buddhaghoso abrāhmaṇo’ti vattu’’nti tatiyaṁ kāraṇaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0105n2:17_6: Na hetaṁ ācariyena brāhmaṇānaṁ parihāsaṁ kātukāmena vuttaṁ,
anya-e0105n2:17_8: aññadatthu yathābhūtamatthaṁ dassetvā sabrahmacārīnaṁ ovādānusāsanidānavasena vattabbaṭṭhānaṁ,
anya-e0105n2:17_10: Tathā hi ye loke paradattūpajīvino samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā aññe vāpi ca puggalā,
anya-e0105n2:17_11: te paccavekkhaṇañāṇarahitā asaṁvare ṭhitā kadāci atipaṇītaṁ rasaṁ pahūtaṁ laddhā aparimitampi bhuñjeyyuṁ,
anya-e0105n2:17_14: Imasmiñhi loke vassasatasahassehi vā vassakoṭīhi vā aparicchinnaddhāne ko sakkā vattuṁ ‘‘nedisā bhūtapubbā’’ti.
anya-e0105n2:17_15: Tasmā tādisehi viya na aparimitabhojanehi bhavitabbanti ovādānusāsanidānavaseneva vuttaṁ.
anya-e0105n2:17_16: Tadevaṁ atthasaṁhitampi samānaṁ ayonisomanasikaroto anatthameva jātaṁ,
anya-e0105n2:17_17: yathā sabhariyassa māgaṇḍiyabrāhmaṇassa anāgāmimaggaphalatthāyapi desitā gāthā dha. pa. aṭṭha.
anya-e0105n2:17_18: 1.sāmāvatīvatthu tesaṁ dhītuyā anatthāya saṁvattatīti saṁvegoyevettha brūhetabboti.
